title: Arbor Snowboards :: The Postcard Series with Scotty Vine: Episode 2 - Mammoth / Bear
description:
In this episode of The Postcard Series, Scotty heads to Mammoth with fellow Arbor riders Mariah Dugan, Mark Reininga, and Mike Gray to take some laps in the park and then finds some urban spots around Mammoth. Afterwards, Scotty continues his California tour with Big Bear. Here, he's accompanied by Erik Leon and Mike Gray, where they lay down some serious tricks in the Bear park.
To Learn more about Arbor Snowboards visit:
arborcollective.com/snowboards/
tags: Arbor,Arbor Snowboards,Scotty Vine,The Postcard Series,Snowboarding,Bear Mountain,Mammoth Mountain
